name: Miller, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Miller, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Flood.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Joseph S. Lord, 3rd, with, him B. Nathaniel Richter and Richter, Lord & Farage, for appellant:
Owen B. Rhoads, with him J. Peter Williams and Philip Price, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Miller, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company.
Argued November 12, 1948.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Joseph S. Lord, 3rd, with, him B. Nathaniel Richter and Richter, Lord & Farage, for appellant:
Owen B. Rhoads, with him J. Peter Williams and Philip Price, for appellee.
January 3, 1949:
